name: Coding
dec: Web Dynamo is an exciting event that provides a platform for web designing enthusiasts to showcase their skills and creativity. This event is perfect for those who are passionate about web designing, user experience, and creativity
rules: One Participant forms a team.
Participant must be familiar with competitive programming
Multiple Rounds will be held with elimination.
Systems will be provided.
Usage of tech gadgets is strictly prohibited during rounds.
Participant of this event can participate in Rhythmic Feets (Dance) event.

name: Photography & Videography
dec: Web Dynamo is an exciting event that provides a platform for web designing enthusiasts to showcase their skills and creativity. This event is perfect for those who are passionate about web designing, user experience, and creativity
rules: Two Participants forms a team.
Participants must bring their own DSLR or Mobile Phone & Laptops with required software for editing.
Round details will be given on spot.

name: Gaming
dec: Web Dynamo is an exciting event that provides a platform for web designing enthusiasts to showcase their skills and creativity. This event is perfect for those who are passionate about web designing, user experience, and creativity
rules: Two Participants forms a team

name: IT Quiz
dec: Web Dynamo is an exciting event that provides a platform for web designing enthusiasts to showcase their skills and creativity. This event is perfect for those who are passionate about web designing, user experience, and creativity

Span: Information technology and Allied Sectors.

name: Web Designing
dec: Web Dynamo is an exciting event that provides a platform for web designing enthusiasts to showcase their skills and creativity. This event is perfect for those who are passionate about web designing, user experience, and creativity
rules: One Participant form a team.

name: Product Launch
dec: Web Dynamo is an exciting event that provides a platform for web designing enthusiasts to showcase their skills and creativity. This event is perfect for those who are passionate about web designing, user experience, and creativity
rules: Two Participants forms a team

Video should be submitted in a pen drive prior to the event to the respectiveevent head.

name: It Manager
dec: Web Dynamo is an exciting event that provides a platform for web designing enthusiasts to showcase their skills and creativity. This event is perfect for those who are passionate about web designing, user experience, and creativity
rules: One Participant forms a team.
Participants can use technological resources according to their needs and priority abiding by the rules.
Multiple rounds will be held with elimination.
Rules will be specific for particular rounds.

name: Paper Presentation
dec: Web Dynamo is an exciting event that provides a platform for web designing enthusiasts to showcase their skills and creativity. This event is perfect for those who are passionate about web designing, user experience, and creativity
rules: One participant forms a team.
Total time allotted per team is 5 + 2 minutes (5min for presentation and 2min for Q/A).
Total time allotted per team is 5 + 2 minutes.
Soft copy of the paper should be submitted through email 2 days prior to the event day (Email: spcpinnacle2k23@gmail.com)
Two hard copies of the paper must be submitted on the day of presentation to the judges.
PPT must be brought in Pen drive or in your own laptop.
Participants must bring their own laptop and necessary items.
Participant of this event can participate in Rhythmic Feets (Dance) event.

name: Surprise Event
dec: Web Dynamo is an exciting event that provides a platform for web designing enthusiasts to showcase their skills and creativity. This event is perfect for those who are passionate about web designing, user experience, and creativity
rules: One Participant forms a team.
Multiple rounds will be held.
Rounds will be announced on the spot.

name: Dance
dec: Web Dynamo is an exciting event that provides a platform for web designing enthusiasts to showcase their skills and creativity. This event is perfect for those who are passionate about web designing, user experience, and creativity
rules: 3-6 Participants forms a team.
All kinds of dance forms like semi-classical, contemporary, Freestyle, western and folk are included.
Time allotted per each team is 4+1 minutes.
Judges and organizers' decisions are final and binding.
Sound tracks should be submitted in a pen drive prior to the event to the respective event head.
An instance of vulgarity/disturbing content will lead to a forceful halt of performance and immediate disqualification.
No use of any powdered substances/fire/water/animals/smoke machine on stage.
Performance will be judged on Theme, Choreograph, Synchronization, Costumes, Facial expression and Creativity.
